title: First Reports
description: WHO China Country Office informed of cases of pneumonia of unknown etiology in Wuhan.

title: Global Emergency
description: WHO declares Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC).

title: Pandemic Declared
description: WHO declares COVID-19 a pandemic as cases exceed 118,000 in 114 countries.

title: Europe Becomes Epicenter
description: WHO announces Europe has become the epicenter of the pandemic.

title: 1 Million Cases
description: Global confirmed cases surpass 1 million.

title: Global Lockdowns
description: More than 3 billion people under lockdown globally.

title: 10 Million Cases
description: Global confirmed cases exceed 10 million.

title: Americas Peak
description: Americas become the hardest-hit region with US, Brazil, and Mexico leading in cases.

title: 1 Million Deaths
description: Global deaths surpass 1 million.

title: Vaccine Breakthrough
description: Pfizer-BioNTech announces their vaccine is 90% effective in Phase 3 trials.

title: First Vaccination
description: Margaret Keenan, 90, becomes the first person to receive Pfizer vaccine outside clinical trials in the UK.

title: US Vaccinations Begin
description: United States begins mass vaccination campaign.

title: 100 Million Cases
description: Global confirmed cases exceed 100 million.

title: India Crisis
description: India reports over 400,000 daily cases as Delta variant spreads rapidly.

title: 3 Million Deaths
description: Global deaths surpass 3 million.

title: Delta Variant Dominance
description: WHO declares Delta variant as the fastest and fittest variant.

title: 200 Million Cases
description: Global confirmed cases exceed 200 million.

title: Omicron Detected
description: WHO designates Omicron (B.1.1.529) as a Variant of Concern.

title: Omicron Wave Peaks
description: Omicron drives global daily cases to record highs, but with lower severity.

title: 6 Million Deaths
description: Global deaths surpass 6 million.

title: 1 Billion Vaccinations
description: Over 1 billion people fully vaccinated globally.

title: Emergency Ends
description: WHO declares end of COVID-19 as a Public Health Emergency of International Concern.

title: Endemic Phase
description: COVID-19 transitions to endemic phase in most countries with continued vaccination and monitoring.
